column4: HackifChris.... I have 150... I like mine 50/50/50 for two OS's and data storage
HackofChris  I have 150... I like mine 50/50/50 for two OS's and data storage
just checking. I am newish to linux in general, wanted to make sure that 2 gb I have for a swap drive really is useful, lol
But if he is just going to wow and use his school software does he need all that space?
Ouch, my bad, didn't realize vista was that big. hopefully that is cause all the extra toshiba crap, but I doubt it...
